dataList.dlg: Got some good meat for me…?
Shop’s not open in the morn. …It’s when I bag ingredients.
Ryōshū’s in the back of the shop. …Y’don’t wanna poke your head in there. Might be you that’s minced on the board, you dig?
…Don’t loiter in the front at this hour. Almost thought you to be a potential ingredient…
Fresh ones are hard to find…
Really now, you haven’t tried our pies…? Customers can’t get enough of ‘em… Haha.
I should keep the cigs outta my mouth when I’m cooking…? There’s no spice like it to add a zing, so what’re you on about…?
Pasty hand pies… I sure miss ‘em. Just doesn’t taste the same if it’s not made from our usual suppliers’ produce…
Gotta know when to compromise, too… Girl’s too stubborn about her “art of delicacy”, always blaming the ingredients.
Mmgh… Mechanical arm’s sore again… What happened to my old arm, you ask? Well, whaddya think? Just where could a fresh and juicy limb go around these parts?
Me…? Ha, guess you do know who the real chef is here, huh…?
Off to search for a new provider, are we?
Hope there’s fresh finds.
Yeesh, ya startled me! I almost swung at you.
Time to slice ‘n dice!
A cut goes here~ A chop goes there~
Uh…
Whew! All diced up~
Ah… Shoot…
This one, right?
Mmh… Was that part spoiled?
Not a bad haul by any means.
Phew… Was that a bit too much? This’ll take a while to lug back…
Ugh… Bet it was bad meat anyway.
